Package indexer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CorpusReader
    A reader of a collection of documents(corpus).
    DocumentReader  
    Tokenizer
    An Object the implements the indexer.Tokenizer interface has to breakdown a String into several tokens using a certain set of rules which the Object is free to chose.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComplexTokenizer
    An implementation of the interface Tokenizer, creates a collection of tokens based on a documents content.
    ComplexTokenizerIndexerBuilder
    An implementation of IndexerBuilder.
    CTStemmingIndexerBuilder  
    DefaultCorpusXMLHandler  
    DirIteratorCorpusReader  
    Index
    A data structure that represents an index that stores how many times a term appears in each file along with the document id.
    Indexer  
    IndexerBuilder
    This abstract class serves as a starting point for the an implementation of the builder pattern with the purpose of creating an instance of an Indexer.
    Main  
    Posting
    This class represents an entry on the index, it has representative purposes.
    SimpleTokenizer  
    SimpleTokenizerIndexerBuilder  
    XMLDocumentHandler  
    XMLReader
